original_title: Cornbread: Street Heat: Lil' Flip vs. T.I.
overview: Get an inside look at the underground world of hip-hop with this edition of Cornbread Street Heat's jam-packed video magazine. This issue explores the beef between Houston rapper Lil' Flip and Atlanta's T.I. Other features include profiles of rapper Young Buck and model-rapper Gloria Velez, a trip to Las Vegas to catch the Music Awards at Caesar's Palace, and plenty of music videos, concert footage, interviews and fight clips.
title: Cornbread: Street Heat: Lil' Flip vs. T.I.
